name: The Inverted Knight
description:
The Inverted Knight is an adventure text game made on the Ink engine.   

You are a knight coming home after great adventure only to find this house is cursed and wife is captured. You are to overcome the strange spell inversing the physics itself and challenge the bloodcurdling  warlock in an attempt to save the beloved one.

This task will take the knight to reconsider everything he ever believed.

  • Non-linear narrative
  • Mechanic turning knight's skills upside down
  • 12 endings as a result of your choice
  • A few simple physics puzzles

Hope you enjoy it!
